project_abstract.cdata: The overall objective of the Technical Education Project is to improve the quality of technical education programs in 11 selected Rajamangala Institute of Technology (RIT) campuses. Specifically, the project aims to: 1) improve the management capacity within the RITs; 2) strengthen curricula and linkages with industry; 3) upgrade workshops and laboratories through the provision of up-to-date equipment and physical improvements to buildings; 4) expand the supply and upgrade the quality of instructional materials; and 5) strengthen the practical skills of key teaching staff in advanced technologies through overseas training. The project will consist of the following components: 1) institutional improvement; 2) equipment; 3) curriculum development; 4) instructional materials; 5) operations and maintenance; and 6) civil works for the refurbishment of facilities.
